name: Cheat To Win | ATOM GAME JAM #2
name_original: Cheat To Win | ATOM GAME JAM #2
description:
-This game is maked for ATOM GAME JAM #2.

-www.atomgamejam.com

-I don't use ready assets.

>Controls:

-W-A-S-D = Movement.

-ESC = Pause Menu.

-Just this. ( •̀ ω •́ )✧

>Summary:

-Help a heart by using a cheat!

>Tips:

-You have to use a cheat code to pass the levels!

-Cheat codes is in The Secret Folder. If you are download game, you'll see.

-About the level 2, if the teacher sees you above it will be hard to get rid of! (Restart game 2-3 times.)

-I think you should go watch the gameplay video! Otherwise you won't understand anything.

-Good Games! (You need to look the secret folder! It gives you good information.(And The Secret Text Document!))

>Announcement:

-I have lots of online classes so it's a short game.

>Arts: Ahmet Han EldrithcWraith(All), Arda ZeReZe The Meow -->(Just one pixel art).

>Codes: Ahmet Han EldrithcWraith(All).

>The game is 51 MB but I dropped it to 24 MB.
